bibl.title: Some Remarks Regarding Commentaries on Codex from Late Antiquity. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - The existence and preservation of ten fragments from commentaries on codex allows to establish with certainty that independent commentaries on codex were indeed still being produced between the third and sixth centuries A.D. Analysis and study of these ten texts.
STROPPA Marco, Some Remarks Regarding Commentaries on Codex from Late Antiquity. Avec résumé en anglais.
